GLEN HYTOFT
Professional Skills:
Operational Excellence and Lean: Proven track record in implementing performance management for Operations organisation, Lean methodologies and a culture of continuous improvements.
Supply Chain Optimization: Expertise in optimising supply chain operations to reduce costs of goods sold, reduce inventory and improve delivery with an end-to-end mindset.
Strategy Implementation: Proficient in translating high-level corporate strategies into actionable roadmaps and plans - as well as consistent driving results.
Financial Acumen and Tech Savvy: Always driving results linked to an improved EBIT ensuring data transparency from IT systems.
Ramp Up Expertise: Demonstrated success leading scale-up and ramp up of production in the chemical industry.

Professional Skills:

Vice President, Chief Supply Chain Officer (CSCO) - 150 FTEs
Topsoe A/S, Sep. 2021 –
Responsible for operational procurement, planning, logistics, shipping, warehouses and internal investments (>500 mDKK). Leader of leaders.
Orchestrated the implementation of C-level strategies into the end-to-end supply chain.
Selected results:
17% reduction in inventory days in 2022.
Improved On-Time-In-Full (OTIF) with 20 %-points by changing the approach to overall OTIF KPI by breaking down the complexity together with the supply chain leadership team.
Digitization of all planning processes in 2022 in SAP S/4 HANA ePPDS & MRP.
Leading cross functional task force ensuring revenue back to expected: 200 mDKK behind budget to 400 mDKK ahead in four months. Deviations to financial reporting were bridged.
Vice President, Continuously Improved & Sustained Operations (Operations) - 80 FTEs
Topsoe A/S, Nov. 2020 – Feb. 2022
Responsible for internal CAPEX investments, Lean organisation, PMO, ramp-up & scale-up organisation, and Global Quality organisation. Leader of leaders.
Selected results:
Performance management system for the entire Operations organisation, resulting in productivity gains (over 25%) and a cultural shift in production.
Lean Academy in Topsoe starting from scratch and achieving the ability to run improvement projects in Operations every 13 weeks with Lean trainees and Lean coaches.
Project Management Office (PMO) to oversee operational improvement projects in Operations including ESG (scope 1 & 2 emissions under SBTi).
Vice President, Catalyst Solutions - 95 FTEs
Haldor Topsøe A/S, Sep. 2017 – Oct. 2020
Responsible for internal CAPEX investments, operational procurement, planning, logistics and shipping, and Global Quality organisation. Leader of leaders.
Acted as the primary liaison for business units, ensuring alignment with strategic goals and (re-)prioritizations.
Selected results:
Due diligence by potential investors in Feb. 2019 of Topsoe. Covered supply chain, performance management and quality management of Operations/Global Supply.
The scale-up and ramp-up specialists team introduced five new products in the regulated chemicals industry in 2020 under ISO 9001 and ISO 14001.
SAP S/4 HANA implemented starting from SAP ECC for Material Management and Quality Management for all production lines and plant sites.
Vice President, Refinery R&D - 80 FTEs
Haldor Topsøe A/S, Mar. 2012 – Aug. 2017
Responsible for short- and long-term development, scale-up and ramp-up of new products and new raw materials in existing products within our Clean Fuel portfolio in the regulated chemicals industry. Leader of leaders.
Selected results:
Stage gate model for Topsoe's catalyst development of new products as well as stage gate model for building production lines for new products not upscaled yet.
Performance management on pilot plant performance (OEE) in R&D.
Honoured with the Topsoe Legacy Price in 2018 for the BRIMⓇ catalyst technology
Vice President, Chemicals R&D - 85 FTEs
Haldor Topsøe A/S, Nov. 2008 - Mar. 2012
Responsible for short- and long-term development, scale-up and ramp-up of new products and new raw materials in existing products within our Chemicals portfolio in the regulated chemicals industry. Leader of leaders.
Leading highly specialised employees via leadership team to better plan for success in production and to ensure future growth.
